title: Where to Stay in Caramoan
description: Explore hotels, resorts, beachfront stays, and homestays in Caramoan Peninsula. Check live prices, availability, photos, and reviews on these trusted platforms (updated for 2026).

platforms.name: Google Travel
platforms.description: Compare hotels, resorts (Tugawe Cove, Gota Village, etc.), maps, and reviews in one place.

platforms.name: Airbnb
platforms.description: Unique homestays, beachfront tiny homes, family houses, and local rentals in Centro, Paniman, or near beaches.

platforms.name: Agoda
platforms.description: Strong local deals on resorts, guesthouses, and beachfront spots — often the cheapest in PH.

platforms.name: Booking.com
platforms.description: Hotels, resorts, and guesthouses with free cancellation and detailed guest reviews.

platforms.name: Expedia
platforms.description: Resorts and packages — good for rewards points and bundled flight + stay deals.

tips.title: Booking Tips for Caramoan
items: Book accommodations 3–6 months ahead for peak season (Dec–May, Holy Week, summer) — popular resorts and homestays book out fast.
Carry plenty of cash (small bills) — many smaller accommodations and eateries are cash-only; ATMs are very limited in Caramoan.
Confirm boat/port transfer arrangements with your accommodation — most offer pick-up from Guijalo Port or Paniman jump-off point.
